title: Five Dishes for Sophie
itunes:title: Five Dishes for Sophie
description:
In this episode, Bobby makes a special menu. But this isn’t a restaurant menu, it’s Bobby’s list of the five dishes that Sophie should add to her repertoire to become a stronger home cook. Listen in to find out what the five fundamental dishes are, and hear bobby’s tips for Sophie to becoming a stronger chef! 

For more information on “Always Hungry” follow the hosts on Instagram: 

Bobby Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
